data.fullContent: The parents were dismayed to find their house in disarray upon returning from their vacation. They had left their teenage children at home, but did not expect this level of destruction. They were horrified to see their windows shattered, and the trash overflowing. They swiftly punished their children.
data.answer: 父母度假回来后，发现家里一片混乱，感到很沮丧。他们把十几岁的孩子留在家里，但没想到会有这么大的破坏。他们惊恐地看到他们的窗户被打碎了，垃圾满地都是。他们很快就惩罚了自己的孩子。
